mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO tbl_product(product_seq, PRODUCT_ID, product_title,product_gender,product_category,product_price,product_color,product_size,product_content,product_img,product_material,product_date) VALUES(product_seq.nextval,product_option_seq.nextval, #{product_title},#{product_gender},#{product_category},#{product_price},#{product_color},#{product_size},#{product_content},#{product_img},#{product_material},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi')) INTO tbl_product_option(product_seq,PRODUCT_ID,product_stock) VALUES(product_seq.CURRVAL,product_option_seq.currval,#{product_stock}) select * from dual

INSERT ALL INTO tbl_product(product_seq, product_id, product_title,product_gender,product_category,product_price,product_color,product_size,product_content,product_img,product_material,product_date) VALUES(product_seq.nextval,product_option_seq.currval, #{product_title},#{product_gender},#{product_category},#{product_price},#{product_color},#{product_size},#{product_content}, #{product_img},#{product_material},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi')) INTO tbl_product_option(product_seq,product_id,product_stock) VALUES(product_seq.CURRVAL,product_option_seq.currval,#{product_stock}) select * from dual
mapper.select: SELECT (select count(product_id) as cnt from (select product_id, count(product_id) from tbl_product group by product_id)) AS product_cnt FROM dual

select product_id, product_title, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by product_id desc) as row_num,product_id, product_title, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img from tbl_product group by product_id, product_title, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img) where row_num between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by product_id desc

select tp.product_seq,tp.product_id, tp.product_title, tp.product_date, tp.product_content, tp.product_price, tp.product_gender, tp.product_category, tp.product_img, tp.product_color, tp.product_size, tp.product_material, tpo.product_stock, tpo.product_saled from tbl_product tp, tbl_product_option tpo where tp.product_seq = tpo.product_seq and tpo.product_id= #{product_id}

select product_id, product_title, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img from tbl_product where product_title like '%' || #{product_title} || '%' group by product_id, product_title, product_price, product_gender, product_category, product_img order by product_id
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product SET product_title=#{product_title},product_content=#{product_content},product_price=#{product_price},product_gender=#{product_gender},product_category=#{product_category}, product_img=#{product_img},product_size=#{product_size},product_color=#{product_color},product_material=#{product_material},product_date =to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') where product_seq=#{product_seq} and product_id=#{product_id}
